systemStatus.title: System Status
systemStatus.subtitle: QUICK CATCH UP YOUR DEVICE STATUS.

power.title: Power
power.subtitle: Power Settings
power.description: This section enables you to dynamically adjust thermal performance and maximize the battery life. It also has other popular power-related features. You can check the default settings in this section and customize your system according to your needs.

powerSmartSettings.title: Power Smart Settings
powerSmartSettings.subtitle: INTELLIGENT COOLING
powerSmartSettings.description1: This feature dynamically adjusts thermal settings to your needs. When on, it adjusts settings to keep the device cooler or quiet, while being held or idle. Otherwise, it optimizes performance while the device is on a stable surface. When off, you can manually set thermal priority.
powerSmartSettings.description2: Intelligent Cooling adjusts fan speed, maximum surface temperature and performance. This feature has below modes and are now accessible by Windows performance power slider.

readMore.line1: Quiet mode: Slider is far left. The fan speed and performance are lowered for a cooler, quieter computer and best battery life.
readMore.line2: Balanced mode: Slider is in the center. Fan speed and performance are dynamically balanced for the best experience.
readMore.line3: Performance mode: Slider is far right. Fan speed and permissible surface temperature are higher for maximum performance.

airPlanePower.title: Airplane Power Mode
airPlanePower.description: Protect the airplane AC power outlet by controlling the power consumption of your system. When Airplane Power Mode is enabled, the computer reduces power consumption by limiting the battery charging rate and system performance.

batteryThreshold.title: Battery Charge Threshold
batteryThreshold.description: If you primarily use your computer with the AC adapter attached and only infrequently use battery power, you can increase the lifespan of the battery by setting the maximum charge value to below 100%. This is useful because batteries that are used infrequently have a longer lifespan when they are maintained at less than a full charge.
batteryThreshold.tooltip: If your battery is currently charged above the stop-charging threshold, detach the power until the battery discharges to or below the stop-charging threshold. Depending on the battery status (old or new), the exact point at which the charging starts or stops might vary by up to 2 percentage points. If you enable the feature, it is recommended that you perform a Battery Gauge Reset occasionally to ensure an accurate report of the battery health.

popup.title: Enable Battery Charge Threshold
popup.description: Enabling a custom battery charge will allow for the overall battery health to last longer as you use this device. However, not having a full charge will allow less runtime battery life. In order to fully enable this feature, please unplug your machine and allow your battery to drain to or below the stop-charging threshold.

expressCharging.title: Express Charging
expressCharging.description: Express Charge allows your battery to a full charge much faster than normal mode.
expressCharging.tooltip: Express Charge allows you to charge your system battery much faster but this may reduce the lifetime of the battery.

conservationMode.title: Conservation Mode
conservationMode.description:
This function is useful to extend the lifespan of your battery when plugged.
When this mode is enabled, the battery will only be charged to 55-60% of capacity and the battery lifespan can be maximized. However, this will shorten the time you use your computer after it is disconnected from the AC power source.

tooltip.line1: This function is useful to extend the lifespan of your battery when plugged.
tooltip.line2: When this mode is enabled, the battery will only be charged to 55-60% of capacity and the battery lifespan can be maximized. However, this will shorten the time you use your computer after it is disconnected from the AC power source.
tooltip.line3: Note: Express Charging and Conservation mode cannot work at the same time. IF one of the modes is turned on, the other one will be automatically turned off.

alwaysUSB.title: Always on USB
alwaysUSB.description: Charge USB devices through the Always on USB connector on the computer, when the computer is in sleep, hibernation, or off mode. A smartphone or tablet can be charged quickly from the USB connector that is yellow-coded or silk-printed with these icons:
alwaysUSB.checkbox: Enable USB charging from laptop battery when computer is off.

easyResume.title: Easy Resume
easyResume.description: Enable this feature to improve your resume time if you frequently open and close your computer's lid.
easyResume.tooltip: This feature will improve your resume time if you frequently open and close your computerâ€™s lid. When enabled, your computer will enter a low power mode when you close its lid, but it will resume instantly if you reopen your lid within 15 minutes of closing it. This feature also allows your notebook to attempt to finish pending activities (such as sending email or downloading a file) before the system goes into suspend.

vantageToolbar.title: Lenovo Vantage Toolbar
vantageToolbar.description: Pin Vantage Toolbar to the Windows task bar to easily get more battery details and access to your quick settings.

audio.title: Audio
audio.subtitle: Audio Settings
audio.description: This section enables you to automatically optimize or fully configure your audio settings manually , such as Dolby settings, microphone, etc.

audioSmartsettings.title: Audio Smartsettings
audioSmartsettings.subtitle: APPLICATION-BASED SETTINGS
audioSmartsettings.description: Automatically adjust audio settings according to different apps you are using.

microphone.title: Microphone
microphone.tooltip: You can customize your MIC effect by adjusting the microphone volume and specify appropriate mode.

volume.title: Microphone Volume
volume.description: Dolby Audio delivers rich, clear, powerful sound from all the content you enjoy, select appropriate mode for your content and equipment.

suppress.title: Suppress keyboard noise
suppress.tooltip: Toggle this on to optimize the MIC audio by suppressing keyboard noise.

acoustic.title: Acoustic Echo Cancellation
acoustic.tooltip: Toggle on this feature to optimize your MIC audio by reducing acoustic echo.

optimize.title: Optimize my microphone for:
optimize.tooltip: Configure microphone effect to enhance your audio experience by different scenarios and environment.

displayCamera.title: Display & Camera
displayCamera.subtitle: Display & Camera Settings
displayCamera.description: This section enables you to improve your visual experience and configure your camera properties. Explore more features and customize your display experience here.

eyeCareMode.title: Eye Care Mode
eyeCareMode.checkbox: Schedule eye care mode from sunset to sunrise
eyeCareMode.tooltip: Eye Care Mode adjusts the color temperature of your display to filter out blue light and reduce eye strain.

camera.title: Camera
camera.note: Note: Lenovo Vantage does not have permissions to access your camera. Please turn on access to your camera for the Lenovo Vantage app.

cameraPrivacy.title: Camera privacy mode
cameraPrivacy.tooltip: The camera stops sending live images when the privacy setting is enabled. Turn this setting on, only when you do not want to share your images to others while video calling.

camera.title: Camera
camera.tooltip: Click here to reset Camera properties to default settings.

critical.title: Critical Updates
critical.tooltip: Critical updates can prevent significant problem, major malfunctions, hardware failure, or data corruption.

recommended.title: Recommended Updates
recommended.tooltip: Recommended driver updates keep your computer running at optimal performance.

banner.title: An up-to-date system is a healthy system.
banner.next: Next updated scan is scheduled on
banner.description: These packages include updates to hardware drivers and other system utilities that are critical for the correct operation of your computer. Critical updates are also important for protecting data on your computer and should be installed as they become available. Failure to install these packages could result in data loss, system malfunction, or hardware failure.

fail.title: Some updates were not installed correctly.
fail.description: Something went wrong during the downloading or installation of these updates. Please make sure you are online and don't turn off computer when installing these updates.

warranty.subDescription1: This product has years limited warranty and it entitled to depot repair service. Customers may call their local service center for more information. Dealers may provide carry-in repair for this product.
warranty.subDescription2: We were unable to locate warranty details for your device, to have more warranty options, please visit our support website.

common.title: Anti-Virus
common.recommends: Lenovo recommends McAfee to protect all your devices with:
common.award: Award winning protection from the latest online threats including ransomware and malware
common.dedicated: Dedicated security that consistently outperforms Defender and other leading AV providers
common.deviceToCloud: Device to cloud technology that won't slow down your PC
common.privacyTerms: Read more on the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
common.betterProtected: .However, you could be better protected with McAfee LifeSafe

windowsDefender.subtitle: You are currently being protected by Windows Defender.However, you could be better protected with McAfee LiveSafe. Learn more below.
windowsDefender.windowsSubtitle: Windows defender offers basic protection for your device

mcafee.title: McAfee LiveSafe
mcafee.subtitle: You are currently protected by McAfee LiveSafe
mcafee.awardSubtitle: Blocks viruses, malware, ransomware, spyware, unwanted program and more on your PC.
mcafee.encryptedSubtitle: Keep sensitive files private by storing them on your PC with 128-bit encryption.
mcafee.identitySubtitle: Take charge of protecting your identity from theft and fraud.
mcafee.supportSubtitle: Has you covered by phone, by chat, or online for the life of your subscription.
mcafee.antiSubtitle: Blocks dangerous messages before they reach your inbox by removing emails that may include risky links and viruses.
mcafee.virusSubtitle: Provides you with the confidence that in the event your PC gets a virus, a McAfee expert will remotely access your computer to remove it.
mcafee.parentalSubtitle: Block web sites and search results you donâ€™t want your kids to see. Also lets you set limits for how much time they spend online.

others.othersProtection: offers you basic protection for your device

container.title: Lenovo Wifi Security
container.name: WIFI SECURITY
container.disableDecribe: Lenovo WiFi Security is an advanced cloud-based software service that helps your device differentiate safe wireless networks from potentially malicious ones.

threatlocator.describe: Use the threat detector to determine the safety of the networks around you.

locationmodal.title: Enable location services
locationmodal.describe: To use Lenovo WiFi Security, you need to enable location services for Lenovo Vantage. Would you like to enable location now?

homesecurity.title: Connected Home Security
homesecurity.titleDescription: Connected Home Security keeps you safe in three ways:
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect1: Connected Home Security ensures your device is safe, and has not been compromised
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect2: Connected Home Security ensures that the networks you are connected to are safe
homesecurity.homeSecurityAffect3: Connected Home Security ensures that other devices connected to your home network are safe.
homesecurity.describe: Unsafe devices and networks can introduce malware, lead to identity theft, and leak private and financial information. Enable this feature to reduce the risk of having your device, and your home network exposed to attackers
homesecurity.subtitle: Peace of Mind
homesecurity.subtitleDescribe: Connected Home Security will send you an alert if it detects a vulnerability in your device or home network, or if you are connected to a potentially malicious network. Learn even more in about Connected Home Security in Tips and Tricks.

invitationcode.buttonDescribe: enter invitation code require enable wifi security
invitationcode.title: Already have Connected Home Security?
invitationcode.titleDescribe: Add this device to your Connected Home

securityhealth.title: Security Health
securityhealth.peaceOfMind: Do you want more peace of mind?
